attributes.title: Easy to use for brands to boost visibility of their software solutions to target audiences

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
Its very easy for brands to build out their product profiles and generate review campaigns to boost reviews. In my opinion it is vital for software products to have a presence on the platform in order to effectively competein their product category. I like the recent feature we leveraged - adding our products to a product suite.
Our G2 reps are always responsive and helpful when we need support, and its been great that we can leverage G2 badges and testimonials in our own marketing campaigns to demonstrate legitimacy.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: It can be a challange to grow organically if your products are not already well-known, so it requires investment. IT's still important to have a presence on the platform.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 showcases the real value of our products according to real customers to adds credibility and trust to our brand.

ease_of_doing_business_with.text: Has the product been a good partner in doing business?

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.
attributes.user_name: Verified User in Information Technology and Services

attributes.title: Partnering with G2 helps us elevate our brand!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
Our account managers are committed to helping us achieve our goals. They are responsive and attentive to our ideas, and they are constantly working to find solutions as well as suggest new approaches. 

The vendor portal is incredibly intuitive and allows us to access the information we need whenever we are seeking it.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The simpleness of the questions makes it easy to source higher quanitity of reviews, but the quality of feedback we receive is often less than ideal. We'd love to get more in-depth review responses from our customers.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 helps us scope our competitive positioning in our market. We are able to manage peer reviews for our brand-- both elevating the positive sentiments in our marfketing efforts and resolving issues alerted to us. We are also using G2 to integrate buyer intent data into our marketing practices.

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.

attributes.title: Awesome Marketing Consultants

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: I love how G2 comes to us with ideas and not the other way around. They are always showing how other clients are using their content and what would best help our company succeed. I also love their webinars and other resources they promote as it's usually very applicable to my day to day. They are always very prompt in responding to our questions and concerns which is greatly appreciated! Lastly, their reputation in the review space is top notch -- they are the #1 trust platform in my opinion for prospects to go to when reviewing products like ours.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Wish there was a way to capture additonal leads through this platform (i.e. a PPC program).

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 has helped us with retargeting content as our G2 badge related ads is our top performing campaign on LinkedIn. It's also helped us identifed accounts engaging with our product on their site through their intent data which we've used across our digital marketing strategy and saw lots of sucess with!

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.

attributes.title: Helpful Team!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 captures a lot a traffic and generate many views on your product site. The best part is their proactiveness to help you maximize your ROI and their openess to correct situations that aren't working.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: They could have more connectors, specifically to Salesforce.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Biggest benefit to Product Marketing are the online reviews and customers willing to be a reference.

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.
attributes.user_name: Verified User in Information Technology and Services

attributes.title: A great platform for customer evidence and social proof

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
G2 is a valuable tool for getting your customers talking about your product on the record about what they like or dislike about your products.  G2 allows your customers to share highlights of their story of using your product in a public way and in their own words which is useful to prospective buyers evaluating your products. 

Feature enhancements and integrations are regularly made on G2 Marketing solutions that help Marketers utilize and gain value from the platform. I've also had a consistently positive experience with their Customer Success team through regular check-ins to help ensure that we are achieving value from G2 Marketing Solutions.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
There can be an over-indexing on review volume and recency and not as much of an emphasis on the quality of review, the content, or how Marketing teams are utilizing reviews which can be difficult for Marketers wearing a lot of hats. 

It's important to strike a balance of review quality and quantity, to respond to reviews, and to be disciplined in taking advantage of all that reviews have to offer Marketing teams today.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 is helping to solve our ability to learn more about our customer's stories including the value they are achieving by using our product, and what they like/dislike about our product. It also helps us understand more about our customer advocates and which customers may be willing to participate in other opportunities with us such as serving as a reference, participating in a customer story, or expand their footprint with us.

ease_of_doing_business_with.text: Has the product been a good partner in doing business?

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.

attributes.title: The simplest, highest quality review vendor, with the best CSM team in the game

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
I've been working with G2 with my company's upgraded profile accounts for years now and each year is better than the last. Our CSMs have always been extremely responsive. I do not say this lightly when I say, I truly feel like we are the CSMs only clients.

The vendor portal is astronomically easier to use than other review vendors on the market. It's very easy to navigate and it's very easy to identify what needs to be or can be updated on your organization's upgraded product profile listing. 

Implementation was smooth and quick, and each year we renew, the team works hard to lay out only our options that are truly the best for our organization.

Integrations are also very simple. We itegrate with Salesforce, Marketo, Demandbase, Influitive, Salesloft, Pendo, Leandata, and Zoominfo, and each connection was very easy to navigate. Our CSMs helped facilitate all of these integretions and connected us with their in-house ops team as well as provided easy-to-follow instructions to make these integrations run smoothly. They were very patient and made sure to test things multiple times and ensure everything worked perfect. 

Review generation campaigns are also extremely easy to run with G2 and super simple too. We send them a list, a budget, and..that's it. They take it from there. The results we see from these campaigns is better than any other review vendor we use. We get good quality reviews from these efforts which helps us show up well on quarterly reports and earn tons of badges which we frequently use for marketing purposes.

Buyer intent data management is very simple and affective with the G2 portal. We receive leads directly into our internal database and can easily pull reports and list distrobutions of a particular moment in time if we want too. We run several competitor campaings and alwsy use the various G2 intent signals to really hone our target. You can get as broad or as grainular with the targeting with G2 buyer intent data.

G2 is a tool I use every day so it's something I need to work well all the time. Compared to other review vendors, the portal is always running well and ive experienced little to no system errors.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I really had to think hard to find somewhere G2 falls short and the ONLY thing I've been able to come up with is some of the marketing assets in the vendor portal are only available via HTML embed code and sometimes we need them in JPEG form. But if you reach out to your CSM, they'll get that for you very quickly.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 marketing has complately changed how we approach out go-to-market strategy. We utilize our earned badges and our quarterly reports in our marketing efforts so much. We are much more motivated to run review campaigns and/or keep our profile updated to get the best results whether it be in organic traffic, conversion, lead flow, etc. G2 works very hard to help you help your company be the best customer-facing profile it can be for your key buyers. Additionally, they make all the marketing assets easily accessible and the CSMs are really good at suggesting where and how to present badges, reports, grid images, and more.

We use our reviews frequently and love seeing feedback on improvements from our customers.

attributes.title: Essential Tool for Building Trust in our Buying Process

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The ability to launch review campaigns with ease, as well as to create customized landing pages and utilize widgets in our email marketing and website are very helpful in establishing ourselves as a market leader in our category. The G2 platform is intuitive, and the team is always willing to help make sure we are getting the most from our investment. The Chilipiper integration has also been a helpful tool to get new leads into our system quickly.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The only downside we experience with G2 is that there are not as many of our competitors that use it, so our category is not robust enough yet to have a report created, which would be a great marketing piece for us.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 helps us get in front of new buyers who are looking for solutions like ours, and helps us build trust with those prospects since we are not the largest player in our space. G2 lets our customer voices shine!

attributes.title: G2 Takes Work off my Hands

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: For me the value G2 adds is having Greg from their team be our consultant. Ultimatelly his ability to understand our product and pitch ideas for campaigns is where the value is for us. Obviously, there is a lot that the platform does to help drive people researching CAD products to our site. But ultimatelly its the consulting service that makes a big difference on why I enjoy using the tool, it's a partnership for success.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: My biggest concern is that the leads we are sourcing are not converting at the rate that we would like them to convert, and that is a pity. But we have seen better performance since we modulated our strategy, so I do hope that the trend will stay possitive.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: They take work off my hands with user traffic and management. Provide a thrid party channel for people to research Onshape through and submit reviews. As a B2B organization this is critical to our success.

attributes.title: Great tool for customer insights

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The simplicity of capturing customer reviews and VOC insisght is highly valuable, as our customers have many competing prioroties in their day. The interface and UX is simple on both ends - for reviewers and account admins. G2 offers robust analytics from review campaign data to buyer intent, and I appreciate the  ability to input custom questions to gather additional decision-making data from our customers.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The review approval process is a bit rigid. I'd appreciate the ability to review/approve/dispute reviews on our end, like we have with some other peer insight platforms.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 is helping us solidify our reputation in the market as more and more cusomers turn to peer review sites. The ability to gain customer insight and identify customer for advocacy opportunities has been a huge bonus.

attributes.title: Great platform to get in depth user and market insights

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: I like how easy and intuitive is the platform to use. You can list your product and create an in depth profile, collect references and leads. The review generation capabilities are great and G2 provides various channels to do so. The CSM's and account owners are always propmt to respond to anything. The reports generation and badges let you understand the competitive market and tweak your offereings based on it. Highly recommend!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?

attributes.title: Great experience and service with G2 Marketing Solutions

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: As someone that inherited a G2 profile, the G2 team were excellent in getting me up to speed and offering solutions for a newbie like me. The platform is easy to use, but has all the data and features one might want from a review platform like G2.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I have no issues at this time. Only thing I note is that while we have a lot of reviews, there is a strong weight put to recent reviews and in my opinion not enough weight put on older reviews.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Harnessing insights from our customers allows us to strategically position ourselves in the market and enhance our customer service. Also, tapping into G2 reviews supports me in achieving my advocacy goals, enabling the creation of unbiased testimonials and video reviews. For Demand Generation, having many high quality reviews is a great tool and resource for both inbound lead generation but also supporting our outbound efforts.

attributes.title: Driving reviews to improve our ranking as a leader

love.text: What do you like best about the product?

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: It would be nice to offer some different incentive options like charitable donations for our pubsec or finserv clients who have strict guidelines for accepting gifts.

Now it is a priority to focus on driving reviews and we have ambitious plans to increase our review traffic to help us improve our rankings.

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.

attributes.title: Target in-market audiences w/ automatic LinkedIn integration

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The ability to target in-market audiences with the LinkedIn integration. The audience builder is simple but in-depth, and audiences synchronize automatically to LinkedIn. Integration with LinkedIn Campaign Manager is quick. Audiences also update automatically. We have had success with a bottom of funnel LinkedIn ad targeting in-market companies based on G2 audiences, layered w/ appropriate job title/seniority/etc. targeting.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I believe the limitation is due to privacy considerations, but contact-level targeting/insights would be preferable to account-level/company lists. There are only 3 levels of Buying Activity and Intent, it would be nice to be able to customize that further, i.e. "X visits to our page during the time frame", or "visited at least Y number of product profiles in the category"

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Targeting the right audience at the right stage in their buying journey. Helps us generate more MQLs.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 is helping us find middle and lower funnel audiences to then targeting in our LinkedIn account.

attributes.title: Great platform and services to get noticed

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 marketing provides a great platform to get your technology in front of potential users, especially if you sell within a crowded market. In addition, their customer success team does a great job advising customers where they can get their best return on investment, and frequently shares resources to help you get noticed on G2.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: This may be somewhat unique to our organization, but their campaigns are less impactful if your product doesn't fit one of their defined categories. It can be difficult to rise above the 'noise' in some of the broader categories.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: For our technology products that serve smaller customers, we often hear that reviews platforms like G2 are where a customer begins their search. G2's marketing programs have allowed us to stand out in categories that our prospects are most likely to search.

attributes.title: G2 captures peer reviews, data and more to better understand our customers and drive pipeline

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 provides vital ease of use information to better understand our customer's product usage, lifecycle experience and likes / dislikes, as well as understanding how we (the vendor) fit into the market ecosystem. Other key data elements include better understanding: Who are the competitiors and their strenghts and weaknesses? Who is looking for a new solution - company, location?  They are excellent at capturing the practioner's voice.  Their customer support is extremely strong and responsive.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
* Capture customer reviews, which helps us be better positioned in the G2 grids and other peer sites
* Drive prospect engagement, which helps to accelerate the sales cycle
* Understand buyer intent, which helps to strategically help key accounts with relevant company / product information and resources

ease_of_doing_business_with.text: Has the product been a good partner in doing business?

attributes.review_source: Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review.

attributes.title: An industry leader in tech customer reviews!

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The vendor portal is extremely user-friendly and there are always helpful updates being made to improve user experience. I love the ability for reviewers to opt-in as references, this adds a lot of business value to our investment. All our CSMs have also been top-notch quality, so incredibly attentive, friendly, and proactive. It's also great that we can add in our own customer review questions! The webhooks is also an incredible feature that comes with our paid product profiles. The leads generated from these webhooks really helps to outrightly prove the value of our investment to leadership.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The biggest downside is not being able to incentivize reviews for non-subscribed products. I feel like this unfairly skews ratings and reviews across products. I wish that the platform offered an annual or bi-annual option for all vendors to load funds for an ad-hoc review collection campaign without vendors having to pay for an entire subscription. Also, we gather many reviews through review sourcing campaigns, but the reviews often times aren't the highest quality, because the review form is very simple. I wish their was a middle ground of the intricateness of the G2 & TR review forms. There is also a frequent tech issues that I run into when I'm inside the vendor portal. When I'm switching from a subscribed product to a non-subscribed product and back to a subscribed product, the subscribed product info begins to display like a non-subscribed product. I always have to refresh the page and navigate directly back to the subscribed product for the normal view to resume.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
-It's catching top-of-the-funnel prospects and providing them with valuable user information from their peers- it's a space very trusted by consumers- allows us to present marketing collateral to prospects 
-Generating review content which we can then use in marketing content such as organic social, competitor pages, and SDR outreach/other enablement activities
-Marketing content from badges/awards

Additionally: It can be expensive for some marketers, especially small businesses or startups, who may not have the budget to invest in G2s products and services. It can be challenging to convert the leads generated by G2 into paying customers, as they may not be ready to buy or may have different expectations. G2 gives an accurate competitive picture of potential solutions, and is a great first step to determine alternative solutions that our Operations team should explore. attributes.title: This company gets a 10 our of 10 for customer service.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Everyone I speak to, thinking to Blake, Stephanie, Dominick, Jarrid and most recently Tabassum, are careful and accurate in all their interactions with our company. 10 out of 10.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I wouldn't mention this, except being asked to finish this recommendation. Tiny little thing, I was confused when trying to change my company description.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Numerical value showing our company support vs competition

attributes.review_source: Organic review. This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate.

attributes.title: We use g2 to drive traffic to our website

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: We could convert a few clients from g2 listing

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
So many features are paid, and also the software which is paying more will be listed higher in the list regardless of the reviews count.

The review process is very long for our customers, it would be much better only to ask a few questions (like what you like / dislike) and make all other fields optional ...

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Listing our product next to other competitor softwares.

attributes.review_source: Organic review. This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate.
